name: Jamsterdam
description:
If you experience stutter, for best quality and experience download the standalone build below.

A game about trying to be a Jazz musician in Amsterdam.

Move with WASD or Arrows, sing with your Mouse, collect donations, pay your bills and survive in Amsterdam.
If you want to play the game without stressing about money running out press X 3 times.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 44

Code & Amsterdam guidance by Ferran Bertomeu
Art & code by Ivan Notaros
Procedural music progression possible with the musical help from YenTing Lo
